scenario_text.value:
Yuck, I thought it looked bad on the outside!
Try not to fall through the floor, okay?

Yeah, I could see that happening. Everyone
watch your step.
Labramon? What is it?! Are you okay?!
Does it hurt? Hang in there, okay?!

(Labramon fell down wincing... Looks like she
was putting up with the pain all this time.)

I’ll go look for the first-aid kit! I bet
there’s one in the nurse’s office.

Takuma, me and Falcomon will keep an eye on
Labramon, you go after her!

Got it, you guys take care of her. Let’s go,
Agumon!
Let’s start on the first floor!
